item.description:
Please read the full description from top to bottom, before you RSVP Yes.


GPS coordinates: 44.141982,-71.684139
Driving directions

Distance: 9.96 miles
Elevation gain: 3575 ft
Book Time: 6 hours and 50 minutes
Trails: Lonesome Lake Tr, Fishin Jimmy Tr, Kinsman Ridge Tr

The plans have changed. Instead of taking the path less travelled from the west where parking is difficult and trail is likely unbroken we will take the more familiar route. The path from Lonesome Lake is well travelled and packed out from latest reports. Lonesome Lake Hut is also open and provides a rest stop.

Weather:
temps around 20 degrees, winds 20-30 mph, 90% cloud cover, 40% chance of precip, 0.3 in of snow



Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we have a true headcount, and not worry that you're late or lost.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

See What to wear on a hike and pack water and food.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.name: North and South Kinsman
